name: Hacker Typer
description:
Type everything in your keyboard and start hacking!

Hacker Typer is just a simple game i developed last night, just for fun! ;D

I hope you like the game and if you want give me your feedback in the comments, please.

HAVE FUN! <3

1.1 UPDATE

  • Now mouse is invisible
  • Added timer to GameOver
  • Added new upgrade
  • Added GameOver screen
